document.title: Michigan World Language Standards and Benchmarks v.8.07

37559740DFE60131943468A86D17958E.description: Participate in school-to-work projects such as an internship or outreach program that requires proficiency in the target language

37553D30DFE60131943368A86D17958E.description: Use authentic target language print materials and electronic media to explore topics of personal interest from the points of view of the new culture

3754E730DFE60131943268A86D17958E.description: Seek opportunities and use the target language in real life situations within the community

37549190DFE60131943168A86D17958E.description: Investigate and present information to others about careers where skills in another language, or cross-cultural understanding, are needed

37543980DFE60131943068A86D17958E.description: Use authentic target language print materials and electronic media to explore topics of personal interest within their own culture and the new culture

3753DD90DFE60131942F68A86D17958E.description: Seek out opportunities and use the target language with teachers, friends, or family outside of the classroom

375376F0DFE60131942E68A86D17958E.description: Identify careers where skills in another language or cross-cultural understanding are needed

37532580DFE60131942D68A86D17958E.description: Use authentic target language print materials and electronic media to explore topics of personal interest and enjoyment

3752D320DFE60131942C68A86D17958E.description: Willingly use the target language within the classroom setting

37527B40DFE60131942B68A86D17958E.description: Personal Enrichment: Students show evidence of becoming life-long learners by using the language for personal enjoyment and enrichment.

375215D0DFE60131942A68A86D17958E.description: Provide services to the school district and community through activities in the target language such as tutoring and helping speakers of the target language to function within the school or community

3751A9B0DFE60131942968A86D17958E.description: Exchange information in the target language with people locally and around the world through avenues such as pen and key pals, email, electronic presentations, publications, and speeches

375153C0DFE60131942868A86D17958E.description: Provide services to others in the school district and community through activities in the target language such as serving as conversation partners for other students in the target language

37510320DFE60131942768A86D17958E.description: Exchange information in the target language with people locally and around the world through avenues such as pen and key pals, email, electronic presentations, and newsletters, and/or webpages

3750B040DFE60131942668A86D17958E.description: Provide services to others in the school district through activities in the target language such as skits and/or musical presentations, or by reading to others in the target language

37505900DFE60131942568A86D17958E.description: Exchange information in the target language with people locally and around the world through avenues such as pen and key pals, email, and electronic presentations

374FFDC0DFE60131942468A86D17958E.description: Use of Language: Students use the language both within and beyond the school setting.

374F9BB0DFE60131942368A86D17958E.description: Communities: Participate in Multilingual Communities at Home and Around the World

374F4210DFE60131942268A86D17958E.description: Describe the institutions, values, beliefs, and perspectives that serve as the foundation of the target culture products and compare them to one's own

374EE9D0DFE60131942168A86D17958E.description: Describe the institutions, values, beliefs, and perspectives that serve as the foundation of the target culture practices and compare them to one's own

374E9560DFE60131942068A86D17958E.description: Identify the significance of the cultural products within the target culture(s) and compare them to one's own

374E40D0DFE60131941F68A86D17958E.description: Identify the significance of the cultural practices within the target culture(s) and compare them to one's own

374DE410DFE60131941E68A86D17958E.description: Identify basic target culture products and compare them to one's own

374D9120DFE60131941D68A86D17958E.description: Identify basic target culture practices and compare them to one's own

374D3480DFE60131941C68A86D17958E.description: Comparing Cultures: Students demonstrate understanding of the concept of culture through comparisons of the cultures studied and their own.

374CCF00DFE60131941B68A86D17958E.description:
Recognize that phonological features reflect culture, and use this knowledge to adjust language accordingly and strengthen the understanding of both languages

Exemption for 4.2.N.d only: No Longer Spoken, Signed

374C6230DFE60131941A68A86D17958E.description: Recognize that register/honorifics reflect culture, and use this knowledge to adjust language accordingly and strengthen the understanding of both languages

374BFCA0DFE60131941968A86D17958E.description: Recognize that grammatical structures reflect culture, and use this knowledge to adjust language accordingly and strengthen the understanding of both languages

374BAC40DFE60131941868A86D17958E.description: Recognize that vocabulary reflects culture and use this knowledge to adjust language accordingly and strengthen the understanding of both languages

374B59D0DFE60131941768A86D17958E.description:
Select phonological features recognizing that meaning is not always conveyed through equivalent application of the same features from one's own language to the target language

Exemption for 4.2.N.d only: No Longer Spoken, Signed

374AFF10DFE60131941668A86D17958E.description: Select register/honorifics recognizing that meaning is not always conveyed through direct word-for-word translation from one's own language and the target language

374A8860DFE60131941568A86D17958E.description: Select grammatical structures recognizing that meaning is not always conveyed through direct word-for-word translation from one's own language to the target language

374A1190DFE60131941468A86D17958E.description: Select vocabulary recognizing that meaning is not always conveyed through direct word-for-word translation from one's own language to the target language

3749B700DFE60131941368A86D17958E.description:
Identify basic differences and similarities in phonological features (such as pronunciation, intonation, and tone) between one's own language and the target language

Exemption for 4.2.N.d only: No Longer Spoken, Signed

37495F30DFE60131941268A86D17958E.description: Identify basic differences and similarities in register/honorifics between one's own language and the target language

3748FE50DFE60131941168A86D17958E.description: Identify basic differences and similarities in grammatical structures between one's own language and the target

37489D20DFE60131941068A86D17958E.description: Identify basic differences and similarities in vocabulary between one's own language and the target language (cognates and borrowed words)

37483850DFE60131940F68A86D17958E.description: Comparing Languages: Students demonstrate understanding of the nature of language through comparisons of the language studied and their own.

3747D8C0DFE60131940E68A86D17958E.description: Comparisons: Develop Insight into the Nature of Language and Culture

37477460DFE60131940D68A86D17958E.description: Use information available only through the target language to identify and compare distinctive cultural viewpoints

37470E20DFE60131940C68A86D17958E.description: Use audio, visual, and/or print materials available only in the target language to acquire information

3746B760DFE60131940B68A86D17958E.description: Use audio, visual, and/or print materials available only in the target language to recognize that a topic or situation may be viewed differently in one's own culture than in the target culture

37466400DFE60131940A68A86D17958E.description: Point of View: Students acquire information and recognize the distinctive viewpoints that are only available through the world language and its cultures.

374612C0DFE60131940968A86D17958E.description: Acquire new content knowledge about unfamiliar topics through the target language

3745C220DFE60131940868A86D17958E.description: Acquire new content knowledge about familiar topics through the target language

37456D80DFE60131940768A86D17958E.description: Reinforce previously learned content knowledge through the target language

374501A0DFE60131940668A86D17958E.description: Knowledge: Students reinforce and further their knowledge of other disciplines through the world language.

37449130DFE60131940568A86D17958E.description: Connections: Connect with Other Disciplines and Acquire Information

37443B70DFE60131940468A86D17958E.description: Analyze how the value of the currency influences the way of life in a community, region, or country in which the language is spoken

3743E830DFE60131940368A86D17958E.description: Analyze the role and impact of the major natural resources, commercial products, services, and industries on the way of life in a community, region or country in which the language is spoken

374390E0DFE60131940268A86D17958E.description: Analyze how cultural values and beliefs about education influence educational facilities, supplies, and materials

37433240DFE60131940168A86D17958E.description: Compare the value of a currency used in a community or country in which the language is spoken with one or more other communities or countries

3742DDD0DFE60131940068A86D17958E.description: Compare the major natural resources, commercial products, services, and industries in a community or country in which the language is spoken with one or more other communities or countries

37428CD0DFE6013193FF68A86D17958E.description: Compare the facilities, supplies and materials needed for schooling in a community or country in which the language is spoken with one or more other communities or countries

374238E0DFE6013193FE68A86D17958E.description: Recognize the currency of a country in which the language is spoken

3741E780DFE6013193FD68A86D17958E.description: Identify the major natural resources, commercial products, services, and industries of a country in which the language is spoken

37418E20DFE6013193FC68A86D17958E.description: Identify facilities, supplies, and materials needed for schooling and activities in a community or culture in which the language is spoken

37413880DFE6013193FB68A86D17958E.description: Understanding the artifacts associated with education, employment, and the economy in the target cultures (E)

3740E5D0DFE6013193FA68A86D17958E.description: Explain how cultural beliefs, values and perspectives influence the products associated with civil, religious, and personal/family holidays or celebrations

37409140DFE6013193F968A86D17958E.description: Analyze how changes in the availability of particular products over time influence work and leisure activities within a community or culture in which the language is spoken

37403430DFE6013193F868A86D17958E.description: Analyze the contribution of indigenous products within the economy of different communities, regions, or countries

373FD250DFE6013193F768A86D17958E.description: Analyze and compare changes over time in products needed to carry out daily routines and meet basic needs within a community, region, or culture in which the language is spoken

3739D3D0DFE6013193F668A86D17958E.description:
Compare the significance of the products associated with an important:
  • civil or religious holiday or celebration AND
  • regional holiday or celebration AND
  • personal or family holiday or celebration across multiple communities or cultures in which the target language is spoken

37397F20DFE6013193F568A86D17958E.description: Compare the products needed for leisure activities within two or more communities, regions, or cultures in which the language is spoken

37392460DFE6013193F468A86D17958E.description: Compare the products that are native to a community, region or country with those of one or more other communities, regions, or countries

3738B680DFE6013193F368A86D17958E.description: Compare the products needed to carry out daily routines and meet basic needs within two or more communities, regions, or cultures in which the language is spoken (housing, stores, food preparation, transportation, health care, public services)

37384B70DFE6013193F268A86D17958E.description:
Describe and explain the significance of the products associated with an important:
  • civil or religious holiday or celebration AND
  • regional holiday or celebration AND
  • personal or family holiday or celebration within a community or culture in which the target language is spoken

3737F7F0DFE6013193F168A86D17958E.description: Describe the products needed for leisure activities commonly practiced within a community, region, or culture in which the language is spoken

3737A2B0DFE6013193F068A86D17958E.description: Identify products that were native to a community, region, or country in which the language is spoken

37374BE0DFE6013193EF68A86D17958E.description: Describe the products needed to carry out daily routines and meet basic needs within a community, region, or culture in which the language is spoken (housing, stores, foods, transportation, health care, public services)

3736F540DFE6013193EE68A86D17958E.description: Understanding the artifacts associated with family and community life within the target culture(s) (F)

37368DB0DFE6013193ED68A86D17958E.description: Analyze the enduring contributions of historic culture to the world (arts, music, architecture, literature, film, media, TV, newspapers, important people)

37363380DFE6013193EC68A86D17958E.description: Analyze the enduring contributions of current cultural icons to the world (arts, music, architecture, literature, film, media, TV, newspapers, important people)

3735D170DFE6013193EB68A86D17958E.description: Describe the significance of historic cultural icons (arts, architecture music, literature, film, media, TV, newspapers, and the creators of these products)

37356D00DFE6013193EA68A86D17958E.description: Describe the significance of current cultural icons (arts, architecture music, literature, film, media, TV, newspapers, and the creators of these products)

37350F70DFE6013193E968A86D17958E.description: Identify historic culture icons (arts, music, literature, film, and the creators of these products as well as natural sites)

3734B420DFE6013193E868A86D17958E.description: Identify current cultural icons (arts, music, literature, film, and the creators of these products as well as natural sites)

37346480DFE6013193E768A86D17958E.description: Understanding the importance of cultural and creative heritage within the target cultures (C)

37341260DFE6013193E668A86D17958E.description: Analyze how geographic location, climate and typical seasonal weather patterns influence the economy and population density

3733BE40DFE6013193E568A86D17958E.description: Analyze the relationship of a country in which the language is spoken to its neighboring countries and throughout the world

37336000DFE6013193E468A86D17958E.description: Explain how geographic features help to define regional identities within a country

3732D9D0DFE6013193E368A86D17958E.description: Locate and explain the development of urban, rural, and suburban areas within a country where the language is spoken

37328A70DFE6013193E268A86D17958E.description: Describe the climate and typical seasonal weather patterns in various regions in additional countries in which the language is spoken

37323B70DFE6013193E168A86D17958E.description: Identify and describe the neighboring countries and geographic features surrounding additional countries in which the language is spoken

3731EB40DFE6013193E068A86D17958E.description: Identify and describe major geographic features (rivers, mountains, deserts, forests) of additional countries or regions in which the language is spoken

373199B0DFE6013193DF68A86D17958E.description: Identify and describe regions and their distinctive characteristics within the countries where the language is spoken

37313FF0DFE6013193DE68A86D17958E.description: Describe the climate and typical seasonal weather patterns in various parts of a country in which the language is spoken

3730EFC0DFE6013193DD68A86D17958E.description: Identify the neighboring countries and geographic features surrounding a country in which the language is spoken

37309EF0DFE6013193DC68A86D17958E.description: Identify major geographic features (rivers, mountains, deserts, forests) of a country in which the language is spoken

37304CA0DFE6013193DB68A86D17958E.description: Identify countries, their capital and major cities in which the language is spoken

372FFA30DFE6013193DA68A86D17958E.description: Understanding the impact of geography and natural resources on the target cultures (G)

372FA380DFE6013193D968A86D17958E.description: Products and Perspectives: Students demonstrate an understanding of the relationship between the products and perspectives of the culture studied.

372F4860DFE6013193D868A86D17958E.description: Analyze the cultural beliefs related to money, wealth, and the social status of various types of employment

372EF170DFE6013193D768A86D17958E.description: Analyze the role and impact of the economic system on a community or country in which the language is spoken

372E9310DFE6013193D668A86D17958E.description: Analyze secondary and post-secondary educational opportunities that lead to careers in the target country

372E2EE0DFE6013193D568A86D17958E.description: Compare the role of work within a community or culture in which the language is spoken with that of one or more other communities or countries

372DBB30DFE6013193D468A86D17958E.description: Compare the economic system in a community or country in which the language is spoken with one or more other communities or countries

372D3F70DFE6013193D368A86D17958E.description: Compare the educational systems in a community or country in which the language is spoken with one or more other communities or countries

372CD5A0DFE6013193D268A86D17958E.description: Identify ways in which people of all ages earn money and/or make a living in a community or culture in which the language is spoken

372C7C50DFE6013193D168A86D17958E.description: Identify the economic system in a community or culture in which the language is spoken

372C23D0DFE6013193D068A86D17958E.description: Identify levels of instruction, courses, and typical daily school schedules and activities in a community or culture in which the language is spoken

372BCC70DFE6013193CF68A86D17958E.description: Understanding education, employment, and the economy in the target cultures (E)

372B79F0DFE6013193CE68A86D17958E.description: Explain how cultural beliefs, values and perspectives serve as the basis for the practices associated with civil, religious, and personal/family holidays or celebrations

372B25D0DFE6013193CD68A86D17958E.description: Analyze the balance between work and leisure activities within a community or culture in which the language is spoken

372AD1C0DFE6013193CC68A86D17958E.description: Analyze and compare changes over time in how daily needs are met within a community or culture in which the language is spoken

372A79E0DFE6013193CB68A86D17958E.description: Analyze the cultural beliefs, values, and perspectives associated with time and daily routines

372A1440DFE6013193CA68A86D17958E.description: Analyze changes in family structures and the role of friends within a community or culture in which the language is spoken

3729BA30DFE6013193C968A86D17958E.description:
Compare the practices and significance of an important:
  • civil or religious holiday or celebration AND
  • regional holiday or celebration AND
  • personal or family holiday or celebration
across multiple communities or cultures in which the target language is spoken

37294F40DFE6013193C868A86D17958E.description: Describe leisure activities associated with a particular community, region, or culture in which the target language is spoken

3728E9E0DFE6013193C768A86D17958E.description: Describe how daily needs are met within two or more communities or cultures in which the language is spoken (housing, shopping, food preparation, transportation, health care, access to public services)

37287DB0DFE6013193C668A86D17958E.description: Compare daily routines within two or more communities or cultures in which the language is spoken (concept of time, typical activities appropriate to various periods during the day)

37282500DFE6013193C568A86D17958E.description: Compare family structures and the role of friends within two or more communities or cultures in which the language is spoken

3727CCB0DFE6013193C468A86D17958E.description:
Explain the practices and significance of an important:
  • civil or religious holiday or celebration AND
  • regional holiday or celebration AND
  • personal or family holiday or celebration
within a community or culture in which the target language is spoken

37277450DFE6013193C368A86D17958E.description: Describe typical leisure activities commonly practiced within a community or culture in which the language is spoken

37271F10DFE6013193C268A86D17958E.description: Describe how daily needs are met within a community or culture in which the language is spoken (housing, shopping, food preparation, transportation, health care, access to public services

3726C5E0DFE6013193C168A86D17958E.description: Describe daily routines within a community or culture in which the language is spoken (concept of time, typical activities appropriate to various periods during the day)

372659D0DFE6013193C068A86D17958E.description: Describe family structures and the role of friends within a community or culture in which the language is spoken

3725FE30DFE6013193BF68A86D17958E.description: Understanding the role of family and community within the target culture(s) (F)

3725A740DFE6013193BE68A86D17958E.description: Analyze the characteristics and beliefs that define the identity of a member of a community or culture in which the language is spoken

37255480DFE6013193BD68A86D17958E.description: Analyze issues of gender, class and/or status in the target culture

3724FB80DFE6013193BC68A86D17958E.description: Explain who is considered majority and minority within a culture

37249DD0DFE6013193BB68A86D17958E.description: Analyze major tensions within and outside a community or country in which the language is spoken

37243590DFE6013193BA68A86D17958E.description: Analyze the impact of major current events on the culture of communities or countries in which the language is spoken

3723D460DFE6013193B968A86D17958E.description: Compare the position vis--vis an important political issue in two or more communities or countries in which the language is spoken

372374C0DFE6013193B868A86D17958E.description: Compare the governmental system of a country in which the language is spoken with that of one or more other countries

37231DC0DFE6013193B768A86D17958E.description: Analyze the impact of major historic events on the culture of communities or countries in which the language is spoken

3722C640DFE6013193B668A86D17958E.description: Analyze the influence of linguistic and cultural expansion on indigenous populations or within different communities, regions, or countries

37227110DFE6013193B568A86D17958E.description: Explain the importance of significant current events in a community or country in which the language is spoken

372217D0DFE6013193B468A86D17958E.description: Explain important political issues in a community or country in which the language is spoken

3721BF40DFE6013193B368A86D17958E.description: Describe three important features of the governmental/political system(s) in a country in which the language is spoken

37216650DFE6013193B268A86D17958E.description: Explain the chronology of major historic events and their impact on the culture of a community or country in which the language is spoken

37210600DFE6013193B168A86D17958E.description: Identify and explain how the language and culture expanded throughout the world

3720B090DFE6013193B068A86D17958E.description: Identify and describe significant current events in a country in which the language is spoken

37205DA0DFE6013193AF68A86D17958E.description: Identify one important political issue in a country in which the language is spoken

372006A0DFE6013193AE68A86D17958E.description: Name the governmental system(s) and key political figures in a country in which the language is spoken

371FAC10DFE6013193AD68A86D17958E.description: Identify and explain the impact of three major historic events and their impact on the culture of a community or country in which the language is spoken

371F41D0DFE6013193AC68A86D17958E.description: Understanding the impact of historic events and governmental systems within the target cultures (H)

371EE160DFE6013193AB68A86D17958E.description: Practices and Perspectives: Students demonstrate an understanding of the relationship between the practices and perspectives of the culture studied.

371E8020DFE6013193AA68A86D17958E.description: Cultures: Gain Knowledge and Understanding of Other Cultures

371E29F0DFE6013193A968A86D17958E.description: Present written reports on familiar and unfamiliar topics in the target language

371DD0B0DFE6013193A868A86D17958E.description: Prepare a written analysis of a literary work, journalistic article, publication, or media/TV/DVD presentation intended for native speakers of the language

371D6E00DFE6013193A768A86D17958E.description: Create and disseminate a newsletter or webpage in the target language

371D1D60DFE6013193A668A86D17958E.description: Present brief written reports about personal experiences, school, and community happenings in the target language

371CCAC0DFE6013193A568A86D17958E.description: Create original compositions or journal entries in the target language

371C61D0DFE6013193A468A86D17958E.description: Illustrate and present materials in the target language such as an informational brochure or instructions for accomplishing a task

371BE780DFE6013193A368A86D17958E.description: Write brief personal descriptions on familiar topics in the target language such as self, friends, family, home, and school

371B8140DFE6013193A268A86D17958E.description: Prepare illustrated stories (big books, posters, dioramas, cartoons) about activities or events in student's personal life, and share these with an audience

371B3090DFE6013193A168A86D17958E.description: Illustrate and present materials in the target language such as an advertisement, poster, or menu

371ADD40DFE6013193A068A86D17958E.description:
Presentational Language-Writing (W)
Exemption: No Formal Writing System Signed

371A8AF0DFE60131939F68A86D17958E.description: Produce an original target language information video/DVD recording of a complete newscast or target culture topic

371A3870DFE60131939E68A86D17958E.description: Present oral reports on familiar and unfamiliar topics in target language

3719DEE0DFE60131939D68A86D17958E.description: Present a summary of a story including plot and characters or an event to an audience

37197420DFE60131939C68A86D17958E.description: Participate in and perform scenes in the target language from plays, and/or poems, or excerpts from short stories

37191E40DFE60131939B68A86D17958E.description: Produce a short original target language video/DVD recording, such as a segment of a newscast, talk show, or game show

3718CB20DFE60131939A68A86D17958E.description: Present brief oral reports about personal experiences, school, and community happenings in target language

37187890DFE60131939968A86D17958E.description: Retell a story to an audience in the target language

37182670DFE60131939868A86D17958E.description: Present skits or short plays in the target language

3717C540DFE60131939768A86D17958E.description: Record materials in the target language, such as a puppet show, fashion show, or weather report

371764F0DFE60131939668A86D17958E.description: Present brief personal descriptions on familiar topics in target language such as self, friends, family, home, and school

37170250DFE60131939568A86D17958E.description: Present songs, poems or stories in the target language

37168C00DFE60131939468A86D17958E.description:
Presentational Language -Speaking (S) or Signed (SL)
Exemption: No Longer Spoken

37162B00DFE60131939368A86D17958E.description: Presentational Communication: Students present information, concepts, and ideas to an audience of listeners or readers on a variety of topics.

3715D560DFE60131939268A86D17958E.description: Understand written interpersonal communication in the target language on a variety of familiar and unfamiliar topics (email, letters, messages, notes, and text messages)

37158390DFE60131939168A86D17958E.description: Understand and analyze written materials in the target language on unfamiliar topics such as, literary works, print media, websites/internet, directions

37153460DFE60131939068A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of written classroom language in the target language on a variety of familiar and unfamiliar topics

3714E3F0DFE60131938F68A86D17958E.description: Understand written interpersonal communication in the target language on familiar topics related to family, school, and community (email, letters, messages, notes, and text messages)

37148F40DFE60131938E68A86D17958E.description: Understand main idea and supporting detail, and summarize accessible written materials on familiar topics in the target language such as, textbook content, magazine and newspaper articles/ads, websites/internet, poetry or stories.

371438A0DFE60131938D68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of written classroom language in the target language on familiar topics

3713E880DFE60131938C68A86D17958E.description: Understand written interpersonal communication on topics of personal interest such as preferences, family life, friends, leisure and school activities, and everyday occurrences (email, letters, messages, notes, and text messages)

371397F0DFE60131938B68A86D17958E.description: Understand main idea of simple accessible written materials in the target language such as, textbook passages, age-appropriate magazine and newspaper articles/ads, websites/internet, poetry or stories

371345F0DFE60131938A68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of written classroom language in the target language including directions, commands, and requests

3712EDE0DFE60131938968A86D17958E.description:
Interperpreting Written Language-Reading (R)
Exemption: No Formal Writing System Signed

37128910DFE60131938868A86D17958E.description: Analyze an audio presentation (CD, lecture, radio, podcast, songs/music)

371226D0DFE60131938768A86D17958E.description: Analyze a visual media or live presentation (film/DVD, TV shows and commercials, theatre and musical production)

3711BDC0DFE60131938668A86D17958E.description: Understand interpersonal communication, spoken messages, interviews, group discussions and lectures in the target language on a variety of familiar and unfamiliar topics
